text: Aap kahiye kay yeh batlao agar Allah Taalaa tumhari sama’at aur basarat biluk ley ley aur tumhary dilon per mohar ker dey to Allah Taalaa kay siwa aur koi mabood hai kay yeh tum ko phir dey dey. Aap dekhiye to hum kiss tarah dalaeel ko mukhtalif pehloo’on say paish ker rahey hain phir bhi yeh aeyraaz kertay hain
